Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored an overhead kick in the 95th minute to equalize the score
Harry Kane headed England into a 2-1 lead in the first minute of extra time
Pre-Game Insights: The match was expected to be a struggle for England based on their previous performances
Gareth Southgate faced criticism for his tactics and substitutions
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate's patience and persistence paid off with a late comeback
Critics of Southgate's tactics received some vindication with the late changes and substitutions
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's first half was described as disjointed and dispiriting
Slovakia's goal was scored by Ivan Schranz in the 25th minute
